name: Dance Squad! V.0
description: This is my very first published project on itch.io! Press start and then choose a mode! If you go into any battle,make sure to remember this: When the white bar lines up with the black bar,hit the spacebar to successfully hit a beat! If you do this correctly,you will see the word "Hit" by the white bar,and if you don't,then you will see the word "Miss" by the white bar.
